column2: Your court physician proposes to help with your weakness

Your court physician [physician_target_weak_ruler.GetFirstName] visited you in your private chambers in order to talk about his new invention. It appears that [physician_target_weak_ruler.GetSheHe] brew a potion that could help you remove your weakness. 'It's entirely safe' - [physician_target_weak_ruler.GetSheHe] assures you. It's only up to you if you'd be willing to try it out.
I don't feel like risking my life to your drug!
I can't change the way I've been created.
Actually I can think of another idea…
You accept to drink the potion.
You refuse to drink the potion.
You refuse to drink the potion.
You try to make another potion.
You are falling down into madness…

It has got you. Madness. The darkness, the abyss… It stares at you. You have nowhere to run. Nowhere to hide. You must run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run. Run.

You are being approached by [From.GetLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]. [Root.job_spiritual.GetSheHe] brings a number of followers with [Root.job_spiritual.GetHerHim], all of them looking angry at you. '[Root.GetTitledName]!' - [Root.job_spiritual.GetSheHe] shouts. 'You are abomination to the [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] world. You shall be exorcised, in order to remove your malfunction from it!'
I won't let you do anything!
I would rather see you dead!
Don't let him do anything to you.

Because of your recent actions the Pope has decided to excommunicate you. You've been separated from the society of all Christians, excluded from the bosom of the Holy Mother the Church in Heaven and on earth.

The ritual is complete, exorcism is done. Yet nothing happens.  [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName] seems to loose his temper,  [Root.job_spiritual.GetSheHe] doesn't now what to say. Either you were not possessed at all or you've somehow overpowered  [Root.job_spiritual.GetHerHis] rites. That doesn't matter now, as you order everyone to get out of your sight. You are left alone in the darkness.
